page.title: 11Education and childplay
page.content: In Hawkchurch they have only got a small school with 2 classes which are an infant and a junior class.All together there are 21 children. When we interviewed 2 children , we asked them what games they play; they said that they play football, hopscotch , cricket and sevensies but mostly they like playing etball and rounders. This is how to play sevensies: you have to bounce a ball against a wall seven times then six times and so on to zero. If you drop it you have to start again.
